title: Lovely Four Bedroom, 1.5 Bath on Quiet Cleveland Street
posting_body: Lovely FOUR bedroom house to rent in Cleveland.

The house has one living room, one and half bathrooms, FOUR bedrooms, beautiful dine-in kitchen with sun-roof, washer dryer hook-ups, unfinished basement, private driveway, and two-car detached garage (Note: Garage Door is Manual and unsecured).
The house comes unfurnished and tenant is responsible to provide their appliances.
Tenant is ALSO RESPONSIBLE TO PAY FOR ALL UTILITIES (water, sewer/trash, gas, and electric), and LAWN CARE.
The house is located on a quiet and family oriented avenue with easy access to Garfield Hgts Park, Valley View, local transport, I480, I77.
PROSPECTIVE RENTERS MUST HAVE A GOOD RENTAL HISTORY AND PROVABLE SOURCE OF RELIABLE INCOME.
ALL APPLICANTS MUST BE WILLING TO UNDERGO RENTAL HISTORY CHECK AND A SATISFACTORY RENTAL REFERENCES IN ORDER BEFORE MOVE-IN.
PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR PHONE NUMBER IN YOUR RESPONSE.
